content.para: The 3.12.0 release upgrades Morfologik Polish stemming dictionary and brings a number of infrastructure refactorings to allow working with more strict security manager policies.

td.p: Upgrade of Morfologik stemming to version 2.1.0.
Refactorings and improvements to allow the framework to work with security managers a with stricter set of policies.

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA
